channel.title: (317) How do you make a base work with a different client?
channel.description: Im using the fast and furious base (delta), but it only works with it's own client, and its client is crappy so is there a way to get it to load up on a different client?

item.title: (317) How do you make a base work with a different client?
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

how is it crappy? its not bad at all just cuz its not a GUI does NOT mean its crappy…

Probably Bluurrs,

Anyway, why doesn’t it work? Is there a UID?

Read full topic
item.source: (317) How do you make a base work with a different client?

item.title: (317) How do you make a base work with a different client?
item.dc:creator: @krayzienacho krayzienacho
item.description:
@krayzienacho wrote:

It just feels wrong, I’ve used the base before, but i never liked the client, nor does many others.
